item.description:
This is posted on another site as well. I think we'll get about twenty people. My cell is 603  557 4775

CHECK THIS PAGE THE DAY OF THE PUB CRAWL FOR ANY CHANGES

 

This Pub Crawl's theme is not supposed to be a downer. It's more of a celebration of how wonderful this past summer has been and how we have a wonderful fall to look forward to...Until the Arctic Tundra sets in for six months. 

Bring your Friends!

 

3:00 Hennessy's

4:00 Hard Rock Cafe

5:00 Ames Plow Tavern

6:00 McFadden's

7:00 Coogans
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting at the bar. Not that hard to locate plus I'll post my cell the day of.
item.name: Summer's Basically Over Pub Crawl
